title: Stage Lv9-P6-S33
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Democracy is not just a word; it's the oxygen of freedom.
Innovation flows like a river, carving new paths through tradition.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 민주주의는 단순한 단어가 아니라 자유의 산소입니다.
sentences.en: Democracy is not just a word; it's the oxygen of freedom.

sentences.kr: 혁신은 강물처럼 흘러서 전통을 통해 새로운 길을 개척합니다.
sentences.en: Innovation flows like a river, carving new paths through tradition.

sentences.kr: 리더십은 폭풍우 치는 바다에서 배들을 안내하는 등대입니다.
sentences.en: Leadership is the lighthouse guiding ships through stormy seas.

sentences.kr: 지식은 어둠 속에서 타오르는 불꽃과 같습니다.
sentences.en: Knowledge is like a flame burning bright in darkness.
Hope is the oasis discovered in the desert.
Trust is like a bridge connecting people together.
Creativity grows like a seed in the right environment.

sentences.kr: 용기는 폭풍 속에서도 굳건히 서 있는 나무입니다.
sentences.en: Courage is the tree standing firm in the storm.
